Ino casts an illusion that tricks the enemy, causing them to see a storm of flowers. This technique has different variations ranging from a field of flowing petals to an overflow of petals surrounding the enemy. With a clear shot, she [[Ninja Wolfsbane|throws the poisonous wolfsbane flower]] at the enemy hitting them in the head.

[[ru:Искусство Ниндзя: Обилие Цветов]]
[[pt-br:Arte Ninja: Profusão de Flores]]
